page.title: 08Employment around Himbleton
page.content: The major employers throughout the area are farmers who employ about 10% of the local population plus a number who reside outside the area. Other places of employment comprise for example of Himbleton Manor , School and garage , and the Galton Arms. About 12% of the population are retired and there are a small number unemployed. The majority of the working population find work outside the area in nearby towns and cities. Some housewives who are not specifically employed do have part-time work. Some seasonal work is available at harvest time through arable farming and fruit picking and at Christmas with turkeys.
